author: Aurelia Munoz
title: Mallorca in alert for heavy rains ¬´ Euro Weekly News
text:
The city council of Palma takes preventive measures during the long weekend beginning November 1 after the orange alert forecast for the storm DANA, while the Spain‚Äôs State Meteorological Agency (AEMET) and the 112 Emergency Service are urging Balearic residents to exercise extreme caution. DANA: Palma de Mallorca emergency prevention plan Reflecting on the damage caused by recent storms and with rainfall expected to reach 50 litres per square metre within an hour, Palma‚Äôs deputy mayor, Javier Bonet, has announced a series of safety measures. Alongside deploying additional firefighters, local police, Civil Protection units, and 20 Emaya (Municipal Water And Sewage Company) municipal brigades, the city council will also temporarily close several parks and cemeteries from Friday November 1 at 2:00 pm until Monday November 4.
Affected parks include Passeig Sagrera, Bellver Forest, Son Tarres Park, and Ses Vies Park. However, in recognition of All Saints‚Äô Day, cemeteries will remain accessible to visitors from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm.
Most Read on Euro Weekly News Squatter crackdown: Spain‚Äôs swift new law puts homeowners first Network provider Ericsson might relocate its HQ from Sweden to the US Liam Payne's funeral: a heartfelt farewell to a beloved star taken too soon Additionally, as a proactive measure following recent flooding incidents in Valencia , the city council will assist homeless individuals in flood-risk areas by providing temporary accommodation for the duration of the alert.
Orange alert for potential flash flooding in Mallorca AEMET warns of intense storm activity due to large-scale convective systems that will likely affect the Balearic Sea and surrounding islands, with rainfall of up to 50 mm expected in an hour and totals reaching 120 mm in 12 hours.
The agency offers real-time weather forecasts online for those wishing to monitor conditions as they develop. 112 Emergency Service, which has activated the Severity Index 1 (IG1) of the Meteobal Plan for rain and storms, reminds residents to follow safety recommendations, such as staying clear of flood-prone areas, avoiding basement and low areas, checking household drainage systems, keeping mobile phones charged, and calling 112 for emergencies.With these measures in place, Palma‚Äôs city council alongside the Balearic Goverment and the 112 Emergency Service hope to mitigate the impact of this storm, keeping residents informed and as safe as possible throughout the coming days.
View all weather news .

author: Yucatan Times
title: Special operation carried out to guarantee the safety of families in public spaces
text:
After the death of a teenager in Bojorquez park , in M√©rida, an operation was put into action, through specialized brigades, to reinforce the safety of families in public spaces.
Municipal Public Services crews supervise the maintenance of electrical installations in public spaces, prioritizing inspection in the spaces occupied by flea markets, to identify the main irregularities.
Four brigades from the Directorate of Municipal Public Services participate in this action, which will work in two shifts; Civil Protection, Markets and Park Rangers will join in, who will carefully inspect 27 parks in various parts of the city where flea markets operate regularly.
Supervision in the spaces occupied by flea markets will allow for a diagnosis to be carried out that will be preceded by comprehensive attention and maintenance of the parks in which bad practices are detected.
The supervision work carried out by the brigades does not warrant the suspension of activities in public spaces, so families will be able to continue enjoying the parks and sports fields.
The crews carried out work in the parks of the Boj√≥rquez and Esperanza neighborhoods, as well as in the Lindavista II subdivision, where work was carried out to reconnect lines, and repair pipes and existing electric power outlets.
In this way, the municipal government ensures and guarantees the safety of Yucatecan families through the detailed review of the electrical installations of the sports fields and other public spaces.
TYT Newsroom

title: #22 Nacho Cano se ofrece a acoger en Malinche a los 347 menores migrantes que enfrentan a Vox y a PP
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
Les pagar√° con cuencos de arroz al d√≠a, y por su bien, dado que han querido venir a trabajar, el es capaz de aguantar la frustraci√≥n y ponerles a trabajar no menos de 12 horas.
[#1](c1#c-1) No hay ninguna dicotom√≠a en lo que expones, ellos tienen bien claro que estos lo que es, es una lucha de clases, somos los dem√°s a los que ellos nos est√°n tapando los ojos con la farandula y RRSS los que perdemos el objetivo.
[#1](c1#c-1) Pues yo a las "v√≠ctimas" las veo denunciar hasta acoso sexual por parte de la polic√≠a. D√≥nde queda el feminismo y la anti represi√≥n?
Lo que hace Nacho Cano es lo mismo que hacen muchos empresarios del campo, tienen a trabajadores inmigrantes debajo de los pl√°sticos de los invernaderos recogiendo la cosecha a 35 grados, pag√°ndoles a 4 euros la hora y despu√©s quej√°ndose en la taberna del pueblo de que los inmigrantes vienen a robar el trabajo a los nacionales. En este caso Cano hace lo mismo , pero incluso pagando menos que en un invernadero. Luego piden el voto para VOX-PP , si es que no hay por donde cogerlo
Ostras puede hace lorence de arabia en espa√±ol !! Con toques gais de la corte de marruecos. Un exito fijo.

author: PTI
title: Delhi HC refuses to permit Shab-e-Barat prayers at Mehrauli‚Äôs Akhoondji mosque demolished by DDA
text:
Home India Delhi HC refuses to permit Shab-e-Barat prayers at Mehrauli‚Äôs Akhoondji mosque demolished... India Judiciary Delhi HC refuses to permit Shab-e-Barat prayers at Mehrauli‚Äôs Akhoondji mosque demolished by DDA The mosque in Mehrauli was recently demolished after being declared illegal by the Delhi Development Authority. PTI 23 February, 2024 03:16 pm IST Facebook Twitter WhatsApp Linkedin File photo of Delhi High Court | PTI Text Size: A- A+
New Delhi: The Delhi High Court on Friday refused to permit prayers at the recently demolished ‚ÄòAkhoondji mosque‚Äô and the nearby graveyard in Mehrauli on the occasion of Shab-e-Barat.
Muslims seek forgiveness from Allah for their sins and those of their ancestors on Shab-e-Barat (the night of atonement).
Justice Purushaindra Kumar Kaurav, while dealing with an application by the Managing Committee of the Delhi Waqf Board, noted that the court has directed status quo on the site which is now in the possession of the Delhi Development Authority (DDA).
Show Full Article
The application forms part of a petition by the committee on the issue of demolition.
Justice Kaurav observed that the main petition, which was heard by the court on several occasions, is already listed for final disposal on March 7.
‚ÄúAt this stage, the court is not inclined to pass any directions. The application is dismissed,‚Äù ordered the court.
The ‚ÄòAkhoondji mosque‚Äô, believed to be over 600 years old, as well as the Behrul Uloom madrasa there were declared as illegal structures in Sanjay Van and demolished by the DDA on January 30.
The counsel for the petitioner said worshippers, whose families are buried in the nearby graveyard, should be allowed offer prayers there on the occasion of Shab-e-Barat later this month.
He said the mosque was several centuries old and prayers were being offered there for the last many years. There was also an ‚Äúactive graveyard‚Äù which was used by the locals, the advocate told the court.
On February 5, the high court had asked the DDA to maintain status quo on the site where the mosque once stood.
The petitioner committee has argued that the demolition of the mosque was illegal.
The DDA has defended its action before the high court on the ground that the demolition took place pursuant to the January 4 recommendation of its Religious Committee. The decision, it said, was taken after the Religious Committee afforded an opportunity of hearing to the CEO of Delhi Waqf Board. The petitioner has, however, contended that the Religious Committee has no jurisdiction to order any demolition action.
On January 31, the court asked the DDA to file its reply clearly setting out the action that has been taken in respect of the property concerned as well as its basis.
It also asked the development authority to state whether any prior notice was given before the demolition.
This report is auto-generated from PTI news service. ThePrint holds no responsibility for its content.

author: undefined undefined
title: Violences: Troisi√®me soir√©e de tensions en Irlande du Nord
text:
ViolencesTroisi√®me soir√©e de tensions en Irlande du Nord
Une agression sexuelle impliquant deux adolescents a d√©clench√© une vague d‚Äô√©meutes contre la communaut√© roumaine.
La ville nord-irlandaise de Ballymena a connu une nouvelle soir√©e de tensions mercredi, avec plusieurs centaines de personnes descendues dans la rue face √† une police d√©ploy√©e en nombre, apr√®s deux jours de violences visant des immigr√©s et d‚Äôaffrontements avec les forces de l‚Äôordre.
Malgr√© les appels au calme des dirigeants de la province, la police anti√©meute a fait face dans la soir√©e √† des jets de cocktails Molotov et autres projectiles dans √† Ballymena, auxquels elle a r√©pondu avec des canons √† eaux, a constat√© un journaliste de l‚ÄôAFP.
Cela fait trois jours que la ville, situ√©e √† une cinquantaine de kilom√®tres au nord de Belfast, est confront√©e √† des heurts, qualifi√©s de violences ¬´racistes¬ª par la police et ¬´d‚Äôattaques insens√©es¬ª par le Premier ministre Keir Starmer.
Un centre de loisirs incendi√©
Ces violences se sont √©galement propag√©es √† d‚Äôautres localit√©s mercredi. Un centre de loisirs a notamment √©t√© incendi√© √† Larne, localit√© situ√©e √† une trentaine de kilom√®tres √† l‚Äôest de Ballymena. Selon les m√©dias locaux, ce centre avait temporairement accueilli la veille des personnes qui avaient besoin d‚Äôun h√©bergement d‚Äôurgence du fait des violences. ¬´Le centre de loisirs de Larne a √©t√© attaqu√© par des voyous masqu√©s (‚Ä¶) Larne n‚Äôa pas besoin de cela¬ª, a r√©agi sur X un d√©put√© local, Danny Donnelly.
Ces heurts ont √©clat√© lundi apr√®s l‚Äôinculpation de deux adolescents de 14 ans pour la tentative de viol d‚Äôune jeune fille. La police, qui √©voque des violences ¬´motiv√©es par des consid√©rations raciales¬ª, n‚Äôa pas communiqu√© sur l‚Äôorigine des deux jeunes. Selon les m√©dias britanniques, ils se sont exprim√©s par l‚Äôinterm√©diaire d‚Äôun interpr√®te roumain lors de leur comparution lundi au tribunal.
32 policiers bless√©s
En deux jours, 32 policiers ont √©t√© bless√©s tandis que six personnes ont √©t√© arr√™t√©es. L‚Äôune d‚Äôelles a √©t√© inculp√©e pour troubles √† l‚Äôordre public, a d√©clar√© mercredi un responsable de la police, Ryan Henderson, lors d‚Äôune conf√©rence de presse.
Les forces de l‚Äôordre ont fait appel √† des renforts du reste du pays en pr√©vision de nouveaux heurts.
Keir Starmer condamne
Devant le Parlement mercredi, Keir Starmer a dit condamner ¬´fermement¬ª les violences des jours pr√©c√©dents.
Mardi soir, des centaines d‚Äôindividus avaient pris pour cible des habitations et commerces et jet√© des briques, fus√©es et cocktails Molotov sur la police. Des incidents plus sporadiques ont aussi eu lieu dans d‚Äôautres villes notamment √† Belfast, Carrickfergus et Newtownabbey, mardi, et Coleraine, mercredi.
Les repr√©sentants du gouvernement nord-irlandais, compos√© de quatre partis politiques et dirig√© par l‚Äô√©lue r√©publicaine du Sinn Fein Michelle O‚ÄôNeill, ont condamn√© mercredi ces ¬´violences √† caract√®re raciste¬ª et lanc√© ¬´un appel urgent au calme¬ª. Ces √©meutes ont notamment vis√© des zones o√π vivent des immigr√©s roumains √† Ballymena. ¬´Ce sont les Roumains qui sont plus sp√©cifiquement cibl√©s¬ª, estime ainsi Nicola Guy, une habitante de Ballymena √¢g√©e de 42 ans, r√©sidant non loin d‚Äôune maison incendi√©e qui √©tait habit√©e par une famille de Roms.
¬´Assez des √©trangers¬ª
¬´Nous envoyons le message que Ballymena en a assez des √©trangers¬ª, a d√©clar√© mercredi soir √† l‚ÄôAFP Allison McCurdy, 52 ans, une habitante.
Les premi√®res violences ont √©clat√© lundi soir √† l‚Äôissue d‚Äôun rassemblement en soutien √† la jeune victime de la tentative de viol pr√©sum√©e et √† sa famille. ¬´Les actes motiv√©s par la haine et la loi de la foule ne font que d√©chirer le tissu de notre soci√©t√©: ils ne r√©solvent rien et ne servent √† personne¬ª, a soulign√© mercredi le commissaire Jon Boutcher.
¬´Ceux qui instrumentalisent la situation pour attiser les tensions raciales se moquent de la justice et n‚Äôont rien √† offrir √† leurs communaut√©s, si ce n‚Äôest de la division et du d√©sordre¬ª, ont rench√©ri les membres de l‚Äôex√©cutif dans leur communiqu√© commun.
Mais le d√©put√© du parti Traditional Unionist Voice Jim Allister a toutefois soulign√© √† la chambre des Communes √† Londres que s‚Äôil n‚Äôy a ¬´aucune excuse¬ª pour de tels actes, ¬´le gouvernement doit prendre conscience des tensions sous-jacentes engendr√©es par une immigration incontr√¥l√©e et souvent clandestine¬ª.

title: üü† Hay alerta amarilla y naranja por tormentas para Buenos Aires y otras 11 provincias para este viernes | TN
text:
El Servicio Meteorol√≥gico Nacional (SMN) anunci√≥ una alerta amarilla y naranja por tormentas en Buenos Aires y otras seis provincias para este viernes 13 de diciembre.
Seg√∫n el SMN , una alerta amarilla indica ‚Äúposibles fen√≥menos meteorol√≥gicos con capacidad de da√±o y riesgo de interrupci√≥n moment√°nea de actividades cotidianas‚Äù, mientras que una alerta naranja anticipa ‚Äúfen√≥menos meteorol√≥gicos peligrosos para la sociedad, la vida, los bienes y el medio ambiente‚Äù.
Le√© tambi√©n: Se vienen las lluvias en Buenos Aires: a qu√© hora es la tormenta este viernes
Alerta por tormentas: las zonas afectadas Buenos Aires Rige una alerta amarilla en el este de la provincia, en todo el recorrido desde el norte (Z√°rate-San Fernando), hasta el sur (Balcarce-Villa Gesell), pasando por el √Årea Metropolitana de Buenos Aires (AMBA) . Ser√° durante la ma√±ana y la tarde , y el √°rea ser√° afectada por tormentas, algunas de las cuales podr√≠an ser localmente fuertes o severas. Estas tormentas estar√°n acompa√±adas de r√°fagas intensas, ocasional ca√≠da de granizo, actividad el√©ctrica significativa y abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos.
Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 30 y 50 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual.
Chaco El SMN indica alerta naranja en toda la provincia durante la ma√±ana . El √°rea ser√° afectada por lluvias y tormentas fuertes. Las mismas podr√°n estar acompa√±adas por actividad el√©ctrica significativa, ca√≠da de granizo, r√°fagas intensas y, especialmente, abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos.
Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 50 y 90 mm . En el este, los valores podr√≠an estar cercanos a los 150 mm .
Corrientes Durante la ma√±ana , rige una alerta naranja en el norte y una alerta amarilla en el este de la provincia .
La alerta naranja indica que el √°rea ser√° afectada por lluvias y tormentas fuertes. Las mismas podr√°n estar acompa√±adas por actividad el√©ctrica significativa, ca√≠da de granizo, r√°fagas intensas y, especialmente, abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos. Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 50 y 90 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual. En el noroeste, los valores podr√≠an estar cercanos a los 150 mm .
En cuanto a la alerta amarilla, el SMN detalla que el √°rea ser√° afectada por tormentas, algunas de las cuales podr√≠an ser localmente fuertes o severas. Estas tormentas estar√°n acompa√±adas de r√°fagas intensas, ocasional ca√≠da de granizo, actividad el√©ctrica significativa y abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos. Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 30 y 50 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual.
Entre R√≠os Alerta amarilla en el sureste de la provincia durante la ma√±ana . El √°rea ser√° afectada por tormentas, algunas de las cuales podr√≠an ser localmente fuertes o severas. Estas tormentas estar√°n acompa√±adas de r√°fagas intensas, ocasional ca√≠da de granizo, actividad el√©ctrica significativa y abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos.
Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 30 y 50 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual.
Formosa En el oeste/norte , rige una alerta amarilla por la ma√±ana . En el centro y este/sur , hay alerta naranja por la ma√±ana y amarilla por la tarde .
La alerta amarilla indica que √°rea ser√° afectada por tormentas, algunas de las cuales podr√≠an ser localmente fuertes o severas. Estas tormentas estar√°n acompa√±adas de r√°fagas intensas, ocasional ca√≠da de granizo, actividad el√©ctrica significativa y abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos. Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 30 y 50 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual.
En cuanto a la alerta naranja, el SMN detalla que el √°rea ser√° afectada por lluvias y tormentas fuertes. Las mismas podr√°n estar acompa√±adas por actividad el√©ctrica significativa, ca√≠da de granizo, r√°fagas intensas y, especialmente, abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos. Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 50 y 90 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual. En el este, los valores podr√≠an estar cercanos a los 150 mm .
Misiones Alerta amarilla durante la ma√±ana y la tarde en toda la provincia. El √°rea ser√° afectada por tormentas, algunas de las cuales podr√≠an ser localmente fuertes o severas. Estas tormentas estar√°n acompa√±adas de r√°fagas intensas, ocasional ca√≠da de granizo, actividad el√©ctrica significativa y abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos.
Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 30 y 50 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual.
Salta Alerta amarilla por la ma√±ana en el noreste de la provincia. El √°rea ser√° afectada por tormentas, algunas de las cuales podr√≠an ser localmente fuertes o severas. Estas tormentas estar√°n acompa√±adas de r√°fagas intensas, ocasional ca√≠da de granizo, actividad el√©ctrica significativa y abundante ca√≠da de agua en cortos per√≠odos.
Se prev√©n valores de precipitaci√≥n acumulada entre 30 y 50 mm , pudiendo ser superados en forma puntual.
El mapa de la alerta por tormentas (Imagen: captura SMN). Recomendaciones para una alerta amarilla por tormentas No saques la basura. Retir√° objetos que impidan que el agua escurra. Evit√° actividades al aire libre. No te refugies cerca de √°rboles y postes de electricidad que puedan caerse. Para minimizar el riesgo de ser alcanzado por un rayo, no permanezcas en playas, r√≠os, lagunas o piletas. Estate atento ante la posible ca√≠da de granizo. Informate por las autoridades. Ten√© siempre lista una mochila de emergencias con linterna, radio, documentos y tel√©fono. Recomendaciones para una alerta naranja por tormentas Permanec√© en construcciones cerradas como casas, escuelas o edificios. Mantenete alejado de artefactos el√©ctricos y evit√° el uso de tel√©fonos con cable. Si est√°s viajando, quedate en el interior del veh√≠culo. Los autom√≥viles ofrecen una excelente protecci√≥n. Evit√° circular por calles inundadas o afectadas. Si hay riesgo de que el agua ingrese en tu casa, cort√° el suministro el√©ctrico. En caso de que vos o alguien m√°s se vea afectado por este fen√≥meno, comunicate con los organismos de emergencias locales. Ten√© siempre lista una mochila de emergencias, con linterna, radio, documentos y tel√©fono.

author: info@kalkinemedia.com (EIN Presswire)
title: HyperFiber Launches Green Team to Support Installation of Fiber-Optic Internet in Punta Gorda Homes
text:
EINPresswire.com/ -- HyperFiber, Punta Gorda‚Äôs only independent, high-speed 100 percent fiber internet provider, today announced that the company has created the Green Team to support its launch of gigabit speeds in Punta Gorda, allowing more than 10,000 homes access to reliable, fast, fiber optic connections.
The HyperFiber Green Team is a dedicated local team that is onsite and involved in the community throughout the fiber installation process.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre part of the community in Punta Gorda, and our goal is to improve the experience people have with the internet. Installing fast internet includes literally breaking ground in neighborhood yards, and we want to make that process as stress-free as possible,‚Äù said Scott Jackson, Director of Field Operations at HyperFiber.
‚ÄúWith our new Green Team, we are available to answer questions and concerns of our residents, as well as manage any yard work that is needed once fiber is installed.‚Äù
HyperFiber‚Äôs Green Team helps support local Punta Gorda residents with the following services:
-Responsiveness with one phone number to call for immediate customer service.
-Pre-construction education and communication, including door-to-door greetings, mailed letters, neighborhood signs and meetings with city officials.
-Tracking the fiber installation process through a construction ticketing system.
-Yard flags with clearly marked signs for identifying utilities.
-Service trucks with three types of local grass seeds to quickly address lawn regrowth.
-Identifying yards with restoration needs.
-Partnering with local landscape companies for yard restoration.
Over the past several months, HyperFiber has built a fiber optic network to serve Punta Gorda. Construction began in the summer, with the first customers connected in the fall. As HyperFiber‚Äôs service becomes available throughout the city, residents will have access to Fiber directly to the home and symmetrical speeds of 1 Gig [1,000 Mbps].
Residents interested in signing up or learning more about HyperFiber can visit
https://hyperfiber.com/areas-we-serve/florida/punta-gorda. If residents have a concern related to fiber installation, please reach out to (941) 289-2486, and HyperFiber can dispatch the Green Team.
About HyperFiber
HyperFiber is the last internet decision consumers will ever need to make with 1 Gig for life, simple pricing, and future-proof fiber solutions from a reliable, hassle-free provider. With HyperFiber, there are no contracts, no limits/data caps, no equipment charges (Wi-Fi included), and always local service. Learn more at
hyperfiber.com.
Emma Sammuli
HyperFiber
